description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=3/3. Explore a real world haunted house. Avoid possessed teddy bears and twisted monstrosities. Solve puzzles and search for clues. Will you unravel the mystery before your fragile mind collapses into insanity? Probably not.
description.short: Explore a real world haunted house. Avoid possessed teddy bears and twisted monstrosities. Solve puzzles and search for clues. Will you unravel the mystery before your fragile mind collapses into insanity? Probably not.
